net.javacoding.jspider.core.throttle.impl
Class DistributedLoadThrottleProvider

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.javacoding.jspider.core.throttle.impl.DistributedLoadThrottleProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThrottleProvider
public class DistributedLoadThrottleProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThrottleProvider

Throttle provider class for the Distributed Load Throttle implementation. This class will generate throttle implementations when refernced from the configuration file (default). $Id: DistributedLoadThrottleProvider.java,v 1.7 2003/04/03 15:57:20 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey
